## Bio

I am currently a research associate at the [Lieber Institute for Brain Development](https://www.libd.org/),
working on RNA-seq analysis primarily in R. I joined the data science team at LIBD
in 2020 after graduating with my PSM in Bioinformatics at Temple University.
